title: Synthesis, biological evaluation, and molecular docking of novel ferulic acid derivatives containing a 1,3,4-oxadiazole thioether and trifluoromethyl pyrimidine skeleton
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16218-16227
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01765J, Paper

Jiansong An, Nianjuan Pan, Chunyi Liu, Haijiang Chen, Qiang Fei, Xiuhai Gan, Wenneng Wu
Compound 6f displayed better antifungal activity against Phomopsis sp. Our study demonstrated that compound 6f formed hydrogen bonds with SER-17, SER-39, ARG-14 and ARG-43 of SDH.
